content.caption: Understanding how to communicate effectively with AI models

content.text: What Is It?

A prompt is the specific input or instruction given to an AI model to generate a desired response. The quality of the prompt directly impacts the quality of the output — better prompts lead to better results.
The best way to learn is through experimentation — try different approaches, refine your inputs, and see what works best.
Not All Prompting Is the Same

Different AI models respond differently to prompts. Text-based models (like ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini) work with conversational prompts, while image generators (like Midjourney, DALL·E) use descriptive visual prompts.

content.text: ChatGPT Prompting

What ChatGPT Excels At: Conversational iteration, creative text generation, dialogue writing, and storytelling. ChatGPT is ideal for brainstorming, expanding ideas, and generating natural-sounding dialogue.
ChatGPT works best when you provide context, specify the desired tone, and iterate on responses. Treat it as a conversation, not a one-shot query.
Best Practices:
Include: Clear role assignments, specific format requests, desired tone/style, examples of what you want.
Avoid: Vague one-word prompts, expecting perfection on the first try, ignoring context from previous messages.

content.title: ChatGPT Prompt Example
content.code:
You are a creative screenwriter specializing in sci-fi short films.
Write a 2-minute script about a robot discovering music for the first time.
Tone: Emotional, wonder-filled. Include visual cues for an AI video.
Format: Scene headings, action lines, and dialogue.

content.title: ChatGPT Iteration Prompt
content.code:
Take the script above and:
1. Make the dialogue more natural
2. Add specific camera angle suggestions
3. Include Midjourney-ready image descriptions for key scenes

content.text: Gemini Prompting
What Gemini Excels At: Multimodal content, visual structure, integration with Google ecosystem. Gemini is best for factual, data-backed content and research-driven scripts.

content.title: Gemini Prompt Example
content.code:
Research the top 5 trending AI video topics in 2025.
For each topic, provide:
- A one-paragraph summary
- 3 potential video angles
- Suggested visual style for AI generation
- Key statistics or data points to include

content.text: Claude Prompting
What Claude Excels At: Emotionally intelligent, ethically grounded narratives. Claude produces nuanced long-form content with a natural, conversational voice.

content.title: Claude Prompt Example
content.code:
Write a 3-minute video script exploring the ethical implications
of AI-generated art. Take a balanced perspective.
Include:
- Personal anecdotes from both sides
- Visual scene descriptions suitable for AI image generation
- A thought-provoking conclusion that doesn't take sides

content.text: CoPilot Prompting
What CoPilot Excels At: Technical, step-by-step instructional content. CoPilot integrates within Microsoft applications for contextual refinement.
Perplexity Prompting
What Perplexity Excels At: Fact-driven, research-focused content with citations. Perplexity provides concise, direct responses backed by sources.
AI Image Generation Prompting

content.caption: Popular AI image generation tools: Midjourney, DALL·E, Gemini Imagen, Adobe Firefly

content.text: Midjourney Prompting
Midjourney (V7) excels at stylized, cinematic, and emotionally rich visuals. It responds best to descriptive, atmosphere-driven prompts.

content.title: Midjourney Prompt Example
content.code:
A lone astronaut standing on a crystalline alien planet,
golden hour lighting, volumetric fog, cinematic composition,
hyper-detailed textures, Wes Anderson color palette --ar 16:9 --v 7 --q 2

content.text: Midjourney prompt codes: --ar (aspect ratio), --v (version), --q (quality), --s (stylize), --no (negative prompt), --tile (seamless pattern).
DALL·E Prompting
DALL·E focuses on photorealistic, design-ready imagery. It supports inpainting (editing specific parts of an image) and style-guided generation.

content.title: DALL·E Prompt Example
content.code:
Create a photorealistic image of a futuristic Tokyo street at night,
neon signs reflecting in rain puddles, a woman in a red kimono
walking with a translucent umbrella, cyberpunk atmosphere,
8K resolution, shallow depth of field
